Breeding male.description: Males have white sides and a white breast whereas male Red-breasted Mergansers have gray sides and a cinnamon breast.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Females/immature Common Mergansers have a neat border between cinnamon throat and white breast; they also have a white patch on the chin that female/immature Red-breasted Mergansers lack.

Adult male.description: Smaller than Red-breasted Mergansers with a shorter black bill.

Female.description: Females/nonbreeding males are smaller with a shorter bill than Red-breasted Mergansers. They are also browner overall than Red-breasted Mergansers.
